attributes.action: Petition To Ban Daniel White Off Snapchat
attributes.additional_details:
This e-Petition is to forever ban Daniel White off the popular image sharing app Snapchat™.

For months friends of "whitey21k" have had to put up with his boring shit snapchats and something has to be done.

Quote from a friend of "whitey21k" who wished to remain Anonymous

"When I receive a snapchat from whitey21k it makes me want to take a bic and start cutting myself again"

This injustice has to stop now before a suicidal epidemic rains over this fair land like a plague.

For Queen & Country!
